entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 in wind prone areas in the afternoon. High 15. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 in wind prone areas early in the evening. Wind becoming light in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023
